cleaned_text: Country Life Aller-Max® [Country Life](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/brand/country-life/) Full Price $16.64 - $30.29 Don't surrender the beautiful weather to your allergies. Enjoy life without them! Try Country Life Aller-Max® for the best support in your body's allergic response. - Helps reduce symptoms of allergies* - Supports the body's natural response to inflammation* - Promotes a healthy immune system* Country Life Aller-Max® You don't have to be told how frustrating seasonal allergies can be, you already know! Never-ending sneezing, itchy hives, watery eyes, and even mistaking symptoms for a cold are all on the list of issues that come with the allergenic seasonal change. But why do our bodies do this? When the seasons change, your body finds itself allergic to something in the air. It reacts by producing histamines, which cause the symptoms of watery eyes, sneezing — you know the rest. How can we avoid these annoying symptoms? Country Life Aller-Max consists of a formula rich in allergy-fighting ingredients that will let you ring in each new season without fear of what's in the air! These nutrients include: - Quercetin helps reduce the presence of histamine, the chemical that causes allergic symptoms like sneezing and itching* - Bromelain supports the body's natural inflammatory response in the sinus, helping relieve allergy symptoms* - Stinging Nettle Extract helps to inhibit the production of histamine, as well as encourage feelings of calmness* - Cayenne Pepper helps break up congestion in the sinus and supports a healthy allergic response* - Grape Seed Extract also helps to reduce histamine production and fight off allergic symptoms* Better support your body's response to inflammation and allergies with Country Life Aller-Max so dealing with those annoying symptoms can be a thing of the past! You deserve to enjoy everything that spring and summer has to offer. Suggested Use: Adults take two (2) capsules daily or as directed by a health care professional.
